bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Melvin D. Brewer, November 22, 1940

div1.p: Hench thanks Brewer for the film, photographs, and extra programs of the Washington and Jefferson College event.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Melvin D. Brewer, November 22, 1940
div1.opener:
November 22, 1940
Mr. M. D. Brewer
Washington and Jefferson College
Washington, Pennsylvania
Dear Mr. Brewer:
div1.p:
I appreciate very much your kindness in
having made for me a duplicate copy of the movies.
They have arrived and are a very nice souvenir of
the happy occasion. I also received from the same
photographer a set of photographs. I did not
receive quite as many as I had wished and am
going to write him directly ordering a few more.
I assume that you gave him my blank check or filled
it in yourself.

I thank you for the extra programs you
sent me. I am glad to have these and will use them
judiciously, placing them in the hands of interested
friends who may help in our venture to restore and
memorialize the buildings used by Reed.
div1.closer: Very truly yours, P. S. Hench, M. D. PSH:as
